name: BoxBlock
description:
Description
BoxBlock is a puzzle video game in which the player pushes colored boxes around trying to get them to the right locations.

Please note that..
The character select in the main menu is not working and there are only a handful of levels to be played.

Gamejam
This game is made for the Brackeys jam 2020.2. The theme for this gamejam was rewind. For this game I decided to give the player the option to "Rewind"  the time of the boxes so they go back to their original position.

Because of time I created this game within 12 hours instead of the timeframe given  by the gamejam. This was one week.

Inspiration
BoxBlock is a game inspired by Sokoban.
